description:

So I knew fucking was gonna be out of the questions, and I like to stick to a plan anyway.
Well, it turns out Ransom had plenty of sexual energy left as the normal "Sit in One Place and Be Serviced" video quickly turned into a suckfest all the way around.
I had no idea Ransom could choke down a cock too. There is something amazingly hot about Will burying his cock down his throat..I mean, it's a wonder he can breathe.
I hope you enjoy this Serviced video. Its VERY hot and next time I'm planning on getting a giant dick up Will's ass!
title: Ransom & Will - Serviced
